ing: 2 tablespoons peeled and finely chopped fresh ginger
1 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste
des: "This salsa is very simple, with few ingredients, but has so much flavor! Sweet but spicy, it goes well with chicken, pork or just corn chips. It has a lot of color and looks great with a mix of red, yellow, and blue tortilla chips."
ins: Combine mango, pineapple, cilantro, ginger, red onion, vinegar, and red pepper flakes in a bowl, and stir lightly to mix well.
